definition: sth one wishes to keep secret/ulterior motive/a subject best avoided
secret/hidden/concealed/(prefix) crypto-
to lean upon
feeling/emotion/passion/situation
not to report sth/to keep sth secret

sentences.english: The point is that it alerts you to something that is being withheld.
sentences.chinese: 重要的是，這個手勢提醒了你事有隱情。

sentences.english: There is more in Mary's refusal than meets the eye; I think she's trying to hide something.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗的拒絕另有隱情，我想她是在力圖隱瞞什麼東西。

sentences.english: There's more in Mary's refusal than meets the eye; I think she's trying to hide something.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗的拒絕另有隱情，我想她是在力圖隱瞞什麼東西。

sentences.english: You're born to bring this world affection.
sentences.chinese: 你生下來帶出這世界的隱情。

sentences.english: I suspect there is a catch to their proposal offer.
sentences.chinese: 我懷疑他們的提議另有隱情。

sentences.english: It is however under watch photograph, however the facts one wishes to hide with very labyrinthian under cover.
sentences.chinese: 然而在表相之下，卻隱藏着極爲曲折的隱情。

sentences.english: The public archives, too, contain undiscovered stories.
sentences.chinese: 公開的檔案也包括從未公開的隱情。

definition: false alarm/panic rumor/CL:場|场[chang2]
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
to fool/to hoodwink/to dupe
frightening words to scare people (idiom); alarmist talk/reds under the beds
dejected/disheartened/listless
to mention sth without elaborating (idiom); not giving details
gongs and drums overture to a Chinese opera/to create a disturbance
to prevail upon/to coax
to speak forcefully and with justice (idiom); to argue with the courage of one's convictions
to make a story or theory consistent/to give a plausible explanation/to plug the holes in one's story
(idiom) reluctant to speak about it/tight-lipped
to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat/measure for measure
to use the current topic to put over one's own ideas/to use sth as a pretext to make a fuss
lit. the trees long for peace but the wind will never cease (idiom)/fig. the world changes, whether you want it or not
pinyin: shu4 yu4 jing4 er2 feng1 bu4 zhi3

definition: turmoil/social upheaval
lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
